name: The Office Party (UA Little Rock ACM)
name_original: The Office Party (UA Little Rock ACM)
description:
Can you keep yourself in control at your office party?

Activities:

  • Pour yourself some drinks
  • Play some darts
  • Converse with your coworkers
  • See if you can get that raise you've been wanting.
  • and Don't embarrass yourself!

Main Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • AD - balance
  • Mouse - look around
  • E - interact
  • Escape - exit game

Minigame Controls:

Conversation:

  • E - Advance dialogue / Select dialogue option
  • Game auto scrolls through the dialogue options

Pouring Drinks:

  • A - Slow down bottle
  • D - Hasten bottle
  • Bottle starts pouring at 45 degrees
  • Bottle starts spilling past 7 degrees

Darts:

  • You have 10 darts per game
  • E - Throw dart
